articles.description: Manchester City resume their Champions League title defence with a comfortable victory at FC Copenhagen in the first leg of their last-16 tie.
articles.title: Man City claim first-leg win at FC Copenhagen

articles.description: A brilliant goal by Brahim Diaz hands Real Madrid the advantage following the first leg of their Champions League last-16 tie with RB Leipzig.
articles.title: Superb Diaz strike sees Real Madrid beat Leipzig

articles.description: Forty years ago, Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean gambled a shot at Olympic gold on a radical routine. It paid off handsomely, but their virtuoso performance is not a template for modern ice dancers.
articles.title: How Torvill and Dean chose heart over head and changed a sport

articles.description: British billionaire Sir Jim Ratcliffe's deal to buy a 25% stake in Manchester United is approved by the Premier League.
articles.title: Ratcliffe Man Utd deal approved by Premier League

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says his 100th cap will be "just a number" as he prepares to become the 16th man to reach a century of Tests for England.
articles.title: Reaching 100 Tests 'just a number' - Stokes

articles.description: Scottish Rugby calls on the sport's governing body to publicly acknowledge that a game-defining mistake was made in the last seconds of Scotland's Six Nations loss to France.
articles.title: Scotland seek admission of error from World Rugby

articles.description: Leah Williamson returns to the England squad for the first time since last April for friendlies against Austria and Italy, after recovering from an anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injury.
articles.title: Williamson returns to Lionesses squad

articles.description: Leicester's charge towards the Championship title continues unabated as Jamie Vardy scores in a victory over his boyhood club Sheffield Wednesday.
articles.title: Leicester beat Sheff Wed to go 12 points clear

articles.description: Watch the Kansas City Chiefs celebrate after beating the San Francisco 49ers 25-22 in overtime to win their third Super Bowl in five years.
articles.title: Watch Chiefs celebrate Super Bowl win over 49ers

articles.description: Ferrari say their new SF-24 Formula 1 car "must be a consistent front runner" when the new season starts at the Bahrain Grand Prix on 2 March.
articles.title: Ferrari say new SF-24 Formula 1 car 'must be a consistent front runner' from start of new season
